abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32628899, pmid32515254, pmid32628270, pmid32633831, pmid32628783, pmid32621814, pmid32633816, pmid32628307, pmid32621807, pmid32622045, pmid32622141, pmid32622186, pmid32628335, pmid32633718, pmid32634129, pmid32628752, pmid32628748, pmid32628269, pmid32640019, pmid32634126, pmid32537425
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.09
